src

FileFormats.cpp File Reference

Detailed Description

Works with libsndfile to provide encoding and other file information.

#include <wx/arrstr.h>
#include <wx/intl.h>
#include "sndfile.h"
#include "FileFormats.h"
#include "Internat.h"
